snippet: In Rick Santorum's debate performance, he has stressed his own credentials, often with force and energy. But that has come at the expense of attacking Mitt Romney's credentials.
abstract: In Rick Santorum's debate performance, he has stressed his own credentials, often with force and energy. But that has come at the expense of attacking Mitt Romney's credentials.
lead_paragraph: Rick Santorum has clearly made a choice: promote himself tonight rather than attack Mr. Romney.

headline.main: Santorum Promoting Own Record Rather Than Attacking Romney
